thread.title: Shirley Valentine
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Shirley Valentine

author: Shirley Valentine
title: Shirley Valentine
text: I purchased a lovely classic ladies Beadnell Barbour jacket in the sale at a very good price. The jacket was delivered very quickly and is a real quality piece, I absolutely love it. Thank you
